meta_description: Welcome to the Academy Art Museum! Come visit us and discover classes, events, exhibitions, and the beauty of art!
hours_text:
##  Welcome to the Academy Art Museum

**Plan Your Visit**

Admission: Always free

Open: Six days a week (closed Mondays & major holidays)

**Hours**

  * Tuesday: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm  

  * Wednesday: 10:00 am – 4:00 pm  

  * Thursday: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm  

  * Friday: 10:00 am – 4:00 pm  

  * Saturday: 10:00 am – 4:00 pm  

  * Sunday: 10:00 am – 4:00 pm

**Location**

Historic downtown Easton, Maryland

**Parking**

  * Free 2hr Street parking available on surrounding blocks.  

  * Free public parking lot located behind the Waterfowl Building, directly adjacent to the Museum

**Entrance**

Enter through Harrison Street, via the courtyard and our glass cube front entrance.

**Accessibility**

The Academy Art Museum is fully accessible.

  * A ramp provides access through our front entrance  

  * Wheelchairs are available for visitor use
  * An elevator provides access to the second floor

If you have questions or need assistance planning your visit, our staff is happy to help.

Academy Art Museum is supported in part by the [Maryland State Arts Council](http://msac.org) ([msac.org](http://msac.org))

admission_text:
##  Open House – Explore Museum Membership

Saturday, January 31, 2026 | 11 a.m. - 3 p.m.

[Classes And Workshops](https://academyartmuseum.org/category/classes/)[Free Events](https://academyartmuseum.org/category/free-events/)

**Join us on January 31 from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. for a Membership Open House at the Academy Art Museum—your last chance to lock in 2025 pricing before rates increase on February 1st.**

Whether you’re becoming a member for the first time or renewing your membership, you don’t want to miss this amazing opportunity to explore all we have to offer at the Academy Art Museum in 2026. New members will enjoy a year of membership at our 2025 pricing levels starting on Jan. 31. Existing members will be able to pay on site at the 2025 prices and enjoy membership for a full year from your current expiration date—whether it’s in January or a subsequent month! 

As an added bonus, the first 200 people who opt in for auto-renew will receive a free screen printed T-shirt illustrated by Galen Marquess. 

**Other Highlights of the Membership Open House include:**  

  * The grand opening of our new Printmaking Studio with a live printmaking demonstrations by Scott Spector of Bay Imprint and instructor Rosemary Cooley
  * A chance to tour our studios, meet our instructors, and talk to our Director of Education, Matt Moore, about which class is right for you
  * Family Art Day activities with our youth instructors in the new children’s studio 

You’ll also have the opport...
